verbs.description: i [V: did] n’t fall in love with my wife it no surprise that we are so bad at marriage in this culture we 're bad at it because we do n't understand it and we do n't understand it because we do n't understand love you ca n't forge a lasting marriage if all you know about love is what you learned from an ed sheeran song it like trying to build a car when you think engines run on fairy dust and that essentially how many of us approach marriage we believe it fueled by some intense and mystical emotional force ed sheeran nicholas sparks matt walsh
